title: Jay Z and Blue Ivy's Reaction to Beyonc√©'s Grammys Performance is Everything
text:
Beyonc√© took the stage at the 2017 Grammys on Sunday and immediately slayed everyone in attendance ‚Äî but few were as mesmerized and proud of the Queen Bee during her performance as her husband and daughter.
Blue Ivy's reaction to her mom @beyonce 's #GRAMMYs performance is TOO CUTE FOR WORDS üòçüòçüòç pic.twitter.com/wbCA6qva12
‚Äî Cosmopolitan (@Cosmopolitan) February 13, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Blue Ivy couldn't have looked more in awe of her momma after she finished, while Jay Z was brought to tears after seeing his wife get misty-eyed. The moment was made all the more significant given Beyonc√©'s choice to perform "Love Drought" and "Sandcastles," two songs from the latter half of Lemonade that signify the strength of their relationship.
Omg JAY Z's reaction to @beyonce 's #GRAMMYs performance üò©üò©üò© pic.twitter.com/cJTyDuIhDK
‚Äî Cosmopolitan (@Cosmopolitan) February 13, 2017 In an audience cam shot posted by the Grammys YouTube page, the pair also looked totally mesmerized by what was happening on stage ‚Äî although it's unclear if it was taken during Bey's performance.
Follow Gina on Twitter .
